A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sadly the movie felt more like a parodie of Star Wars than a movie that took the source material serious. It almost feels like the film makers wanted to be so smart with their plot twists they actually forgot to make a compelling\, coherent and logical film and ended up parodying everything this universe stands for. A movie full of missed opportunities and unnecessary story lines that make you think why this movie had to be made in the first place.
